messages.subject: Re: Goodbye for the holidays
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 12/15/99 1:54:03 PM Eastern Standard Time, jhawthorne@home.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 12/15/99 1:54:03 PM Eastern Standard Time,
jhawthorne@... writes:

<< I am unsubscribing for the holidays. Will be back after Christmas
sometime. My
plate is full. I hope everyone has a good holiday season.

until next time, the very best wishes to all of you folk and thanks for all
of
the supportive, thought provoking conversation.

Joel
>>


I am going to no mail for a couple of weeks. With Christmas and kitchen
remodeling I am not making it to the computer much.

I hope all of you have a safe and Happy Holiday.

Laura

messages.subject: Re: Goodbye for the holidays
messages.msgSnippet: I am unsubscribing for the holidays.  Will be back after Christmas sometime.  My plate is full.  I hope everyone has a good holiday season. until next time,
messages.messageBody:
I am unsubscribing for the holidays. Will be back after Christmas sometime. My
plate is full. I hope everyone has a good holiday season.

until next time, the very best wishes to all of you folk and thanks for all of
the supportive, thought provoking conversation.

Joel

For a wonderful gift possibility and to support a great cause check out:

All children behave as well as they are treated. The Natural Child
